system.description:
Svirfneblins can understand the imperceptible grumblings of stone. If a svirfneblin stands quietly for one turn with their ear pressed against a stone surface, they have a [[/br 1d6]]{2-in-6} chance of divining one of the following pieces of information (player’s choice):

  • The presence of secret doors in the stone, within 10’.

  • The presence of gems or precious metals, up to 30’ beyond the surface.

  • The presence of living creatures, up to 30’ beyond the surface.

  • The presence of bodies of water or open spaces, up to 60’ beyond the surface.
